person.persName: John B. Brownlee (Captain of the 21st Kentucky Infantry (Co. B))

body.p: A Kentucky farmer and soldier. Lived in Metcalfe County, Kentucky in 1860. Served as an election officer, as clerk, in Lafayette Precinct No. 5 in Metcalfe County in 1860. Served as second lieutenant of the 21st Kentucky Infantry (Co. B) from December 1861 to November 1862. As first lieutenant from November 1862 to March 1863. Served as captain from March 1863 to May 1863. Resigned due to death of father and health issues. Returned to Metcalfe County to manage family business.
